entries.title: Reports - TCMB
entries.text: The Central Bank publishes its evaluations regarding the inflation outlook, medium-term inflation and output gap forecasts, factors affecting inflation.

entries.title: Statistics - TCMB
entries.text: Money, banking, finance and securities statistics for the banking and financial sector prepared by the Central Bank in accordance with international standards.

entries.title: Weekly Money and Banking Statistics - TCMB
entries.text: The Weekly Money and Banking Statistics consist of statistical tables on the banking sector's deposits, credits and securities as well as monetary aggregates.

entries.title: Data - TCMB
entries.text: Data ; Foreign Exchange Assets and Liabilities of Non-Financial Companies (May 2025). 22.07.2025 ; Survey of Market Participants (July 2025). 21.07.2025 ; Weekly ...

entries.title: Monetary Policy Texts - TCMB
entries.text: Monetary Policy Texts · Monetary Policy for 2025 · Monetary Policy for 2024 · Monetary Policy and Liraization Strategy for 2023 · Monetary and Exchange Rate Policy ...

entries.title: Central Bank Monetary Policy Framework - TCMB
entries.text: The Central Bank stated that the ultimate objective of the monetary policy was to move to inflation targeting.

entries.title: Policy Implementations Regarding Financial Stability - TCMB
entries.text: The CBRT adopted a flexible monetary policy oriented towards the primary objective of price stability that also safeguards financial stability.

entries.title: Press Releases - TCMB
entries.text: Central Bank of the Republic of Türkiye and People's Bank of China Sign Memorandum of Understanding on Establishing Renminbi Clearing Arrangements (2025-35).

entries.title: Press Briefings - TCMB
entries.text: The Central Bank holds press briefings to introduce Inflation Reports, which are one of its main communication tools.

entries.title: Press Release on Interest Rates (2025-24) - TCMB
entries.text: The Monetary Policy Committee (the Committee) has decided to raise the policy rate (the one-week repo auction rate) from 42.5 percent to 46 percent.

entries.title: Working Papers - TCMB
